mapper.sql: dept_id, dept_name, dept_code, parent_id, dept_level, welcome_page, state, list_order, accept_ask, accept_delegate, allow_delegate, dept_icon, memo, dept_shortname, accept_report
mapper.insert: insert into t_dept(dept_id, dept_name, dept_code, parent_id, dept_level, welcome_page, state, list_order, accept_ask, accept_delegate, allow_delegate, dept_icon, memo, dept_shortname, accept_report) values (#{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{deptCode}, #{parentId}, #{deptLevel}, #{welcomePage}, #{state}, #{listOrder}, #{acceptAsk}, #{acceptDelegate}, #{allowDelegate}, #{deptIcon}, #{memo}, #{deptShortname}, #{acceptReport})
mapper.update: update t_dept set dept_name = #{deptName}, dept_code = #{deptCode}, parent_id = #{parentId}, dept_level = #{deptLevel}, welcome_page = #{welcomePage}, state = #{state}, list_order = #{listOrder}, accept_ask = #{acceptAsk}, accept_delegate = #{acceptDelegate}, allow_delegate = #{allowDelegate}, dept_icon = #{deptIcon}, memo = #{memo}, dept_shortname = #{deptShortname}, accept_report = #{acceptReport} where dept_id = #{deptId}
